S08n2927:0: Buddhakapālatantra 9 caryāpaṭala athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi caryāpaṭalaṃ sudurlabham |
S08n2927:1: yena yogī kurute sarva caryā atyantavarāṅganā || 1 ||
S08n2927:4: yad yat sattvāḥ siddhyarthino tāṃ tāṃ dāpayet sadā || 2 ||
S08n2927:6: kare kapālaṃ gṛhītvā caryā bhramate vratī |
S08n2927:7: nagno muktaśikho bhūtvā yatra tatra yadā tadā |
S08n2927:11: bhikṣām aṭate prājñaḥ gṛhe gṛhe niḥsaṃśayaḥ |
S08n2927:16: na iti śūnyatābhāvaṃ dadāti it bhāvanām || 5 ||
S08n2927:18: jā ity anuttaram yānaṃ mahāmudrā sa kathyate |
S08n2927:21: paścād bhakṣayed dravyaṃ kapāle tu vyavasthitam |
S08n2927:30: (2) tathā coktaṃ tantre- jathā pi tatha pi jaha pi taha pi jena tena hua buddha |
S08n2927:31: saiṃ vi-appe ṇāsi-ā sa-ala sahāve śuddha || 9 ||
S08n2927:33: iti buddhakapālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare caryāpaṭalo navamaḥ || ||
S08n2927:38: muktikā śuktikā caiva rājapaṭa pravālasya ca |
S08n2927:42: na ta auṣadha bāhyam ity uktam- na cāpi cchalla pallavaḥ sa ca |
S08n2927:46: na cāpi aparalohasyāpi siddham auṣadham uttamam || 3 ||
S08n2927:52: ke te auṣadhi divyā siddhiś ca kīdṛśī bhavet |
S08n2927:53: kathāyāhi tvaṃ mahādevī śrotum icchāmi ādarāt || 5 ||
S08n2927:61: kena dravyaṃ bahavo yānti vandhyā sutavatī bhavet |
S08n2927:62: mṛtavān saṃjīvate na mriyate punaḥ punaḥ || 7 ||
S08n2927:66: sa ca sidhyante subhājanaṃ divyaṃ na jānanti bāla mohitāḥ || 8 ||
S08n2927:69: kathaṃ sattvārtha sādhyante hā hā kaṣṭaikatatparam || 9 ||
S08n2927:73: nāḍi madhye rasanī nāma tiṣṭhanti divyamahauṣadhī || 10 ||
S08n2927:75: lohaṃ yena hematāṃ yānty ekenāsaṅkhyaṃ vidhyati |
S08n2927:87: tathāgatān sevayantī nityaṃ suguptā nirghṛṇaḥ sa ca || 14 ||
S08n2927:91: śīghradrutir bhaved yasya sa na sidhyati || 15 ||
S08n2927:97: tathā coktam- dhairyaṃ hi parama nāyakapadam |
S08n2927:99: ata eva hi vīracetasā kāryaṃ subhājane pracodayet || 17 ||
S08n2927:104: tatra hrīṃkārabījaṃ sarvadravyaika pūrvaṃ merurājena bhūṣitam || 18 ||
S08n2927:112: paścāt karma samārabhet prājño vīrayogena cetasā |
S08n2927:115: subhājane viśramate tatra cyutiyogāt kharaṇam eva ca |
S08n2927:116: śīghraṃ divyaṃ samāgṛhya guḍā lepayed budhaḥ || 22 ||
S08n2927:120: (8) paścād rakṣate prājñaḥ hemo bhavati niḥsaṃśayaḥ || 23 ||
S08n2927:131: ayam apramāṇaṃ yaḥ karoti prājñaḥ śrutavanto mahāmatiḥ |
S08n2927:132: te sarve narakaṃ yānti yāvad buddhair na hīyate || 26 ||
S08n2927:144: jīvate kalpokoṭiṃ naraḥ yāvad buddhajñānam eva ca || 29 ||
S08n2927:150: pañcavarṇarajaḥ kṛtya atha vā śuklam eva ca |
S08n2927:158: sā strī yā vandhyā tasyā eva |
S08n2927:165: caturbhujam ekavaktraṃ ca evam uccāraṇan viduḥ |
S08n2927:177: iti buddhakapālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare divyamahauṣadhivandhyāsnānavidhipaṭalo daśamaḥ || ||
S08n2927:183: pūrvoktacihnabhujādyaiḥ paraṃ hi varṇa śuklam eva ca |
S08n2927:184: digyoginī bhavet śuklaṃ vidig raktam eva ca || 2 ||
S08n2927:196: daṣṭaka bhūtale na kiṃcij jīvāpayituṃ śakyate |
S08n2927:207: tasya hṛdaye likhen mantraṃ yatra tatra patre tathā |
S08n2927:208: mahātailena kṛtvā masīṃ mantraṃ likhed viduḥ || 9 ||
S08n2927:220: evaṃ paripūrṇaṃ kṛtvā patra hṛdaya sthāpayet |
S08n2927:224: ghaṭ ghaṭ ghaḍa ghaḍa hrīḥ hrīḥ haḥ haḥ he he haṃ haḥ || 12 ||
S08n2927:228: ekasmin khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ bhūtvā patati daṣṭakotthati nātra saṃśayaḥ || 13 ||
S08n2927:232: pañcadaśa pustake na likhitaṃ gamyate guruprasādataḥ || 14 ||
S08n2927:237: (15) 12 nānāmantraprayogapaṭala atha vajrapāṇiś citrasenā yoginī muhur muhuḥ praṇipatyaivam uvāca- || 1 ||
S08n2927:240: uktaṃ tvayā yat prayogaṃ trailokyeṣv api durlabham || 2 ||
S08n2927:242: dṛṣṭā mayā sarvatantrāṇi ye te prayogāḥ sudurlabhāḥ |
S08n2927:243: iha tantre tvayā yad uktaṃ sarvabuddhair na bhāṣitāḥ || 3 ||
S08n2927:246: aho hī sarvabuddhasaṃjananī aho hī mahāmudrātatpari || 4 ||
S08n2927:248: bhāṣasva devi sarvamantrāṇāṃ ye te prayogāḥ sudurlabhāḥ |
S08n2927:249: (16) yogino yena citraṃ kurvanti nānāścaryam eva ca |
S08n2927:250: prathamapaṭale yad yad uktaṃ devi tatproyogaṃ kathayāhi me || 5 ||
S08n2927:252: īdṛg vacanaṃ śrutvā citrasenā tu yoginī |
S08n2927:256: mārāḥ sarve prapalāyanti vighnāś ca pralayaṃ gatāḥ |
S08n2927:257: āścaryaṃ jinavaraiḥ sarvaiḥ aho hāsasya niścayaḥ || 7 ||
S08n2927:261: tasya kaṭibhāgāsthiṃ tu gṛhītvā kuṇḍa kārayet || 8 ||
S08n2927:263: tasya kāpālam anu gṛhya tenaiva śirasā varti dāpayet |
S08n2927:268: yogī buddhakāpāladharo bhūtvā imaṃ mantram uccārayan || 10 ||
S08n2927:270: oṃ buddhakapālinī dhara 2 dhadhara 2 dharāpaya 2 śoṣaya 2 tāpaya 2 drāṃ 2 āṃ māṃ sāṃ ra vāṃ kuru 2 bho bhagavati buddhakāpālasyājñā mā laṃghaya śīghraṃ kajjala pata pata pātaya 2 oṃ 2 āḥ hūṃ sumbhaya bho bhagavati hūṃ srāṃ phaṭ || 11 ||
S08n2927:282: (18) paścād yogī mahāprājñaḥ kelimālinī pivetaṃ punaḥ || 14 ||
S08n2927:287: nagnī muktaśikhī bhūtvā hāḥhoḥmantram uccārayed viduḥ |
S08n2927:288: kelimālinī pivāpayet tatra paścāt krīḍā samārabhet || 16 ||
S08n2927:291: kajjalaṃ tu mahādivyaṃ vāmahaste tu sthāpayet || 17 ||
S08n2927:293: paścāt śanaiḥ kāryaiḥ kurvād yogaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ |
S08n2927:299: ekaikavaṭikāṃ aṣṭottaramantraśatenābhimantrya japet- oṃ buddhakāpālinī hrī hūṃ phaṭ || 20 ||
S08n2927:301: anena mantreṇa kajjalaṃ tu mahābāho trailokyeṣv api durlabham |
S08n2927:309: vāmahastamalitamātreṇa tatkṣaṇād eva bhadrako sa jāyate || 23 ||
S08n2927:315: vāmahaste malitamātreṇa svastho bhavati na saṃśayaḥ || 25 ||
S08n2927:325: pratimāṃ tu liṅgaparvatavṛkṣaṃ tu anyāni yāni tāni ca |
S08n2927:329: punar vāmena malitamātreṇa svastho bhavati na saṃśayaḥ |
S08n2927:333: tridaśeṣu bhramet prājñaḥ yad yad vastum icchati |
S08n2927:343: tathā makṣikāś ca tathā hasti gardabham eva ca || 32 ||
S08n2927:381: (22) oṃ buddhakāpālinī dhara 2 hā he ho haṃ haḥ |
S08n2927:384: oṃ buddhakāpālinī rama 2 krīḍa 2 haṃ haḥ |
S08n2927:385: mahiṣāsthikena ratikrīḍā dvādaśavarṣā sa rātrau dine naro cit- taṃ na patati || 45 ||
S08n2927:387: oṃ buddhakāpālinī taṭa 2 trāṭaya 2 maṭ sphaṭ sphoṭaya utpāṭaya hūṃ phaṭ |
S08n2927:390: oṃ sukapālinī ghara 2 maṭa 2 trāṭaya 2 paṭa 2 praṭāpaya 2 truṭa sphaṭa moṭaya 2 saṃkrāmaya hrīṃ hūṃ trayāṃ phaṭ |
S08n2927:393: oṃ buddhakāpālinī he trāsaya māraya ghuṭa ghuṭinī sarvavanaspatīnāṃ hṛdaya tāḍaya vidrāpaya rama 2 trāsaya 2 bho bhagavatī aṃ āṃ āṃ taṭ 2 hūṃ phaṭ |
S08n2927:396: āha- citt' eka vimala darppaṇaṃ jaṃ cintijai taṃ pi pati viśvaṃ jāṇanti vi śuaṇā |
S08n2927:399: (23) iti buddhakapālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare nānā- mantraprayogaḥ paṭalo dvādaśamaḥ || ||
S08n2927:401: (24) 13 cittaviśuddhipaṭala athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi viśuddhipaṭalaṃ śuddha durlabham || 1 ||
S08n2927:403: bhaginī bhāginī jananī duhitā bhāryā-m-eva ca |
S08n2927:404: evaṃ kāmayet prājña mahāmudrāṃ yad iṣyate || 2 ||
S08n2927:408: evaṃ kāmayed dhīmān pañcaite yoginī varām || 3 ||
S08n2927:412: bhaginī bhavet cakṣur bhāginī tu śrotram eva ca |
S08n2927:413: jananī bhaved ghrāṇaṃ rasaṃ duhitā tu eva ca |
S08n2927:417: nartakī bhaven mohaṃ dveṣaṃ ḍombinīṣu ca |
S08n2927:422: cakṣuṣā dṛśyate mohaṃ śabdaṃ dveṣo'pi jāyate |
S08n2927:423: ghrāṇena bhujyate rāgaṃ rasaṃ mānaṃ tu eva ca |
S08n2927:424: sparśena jāyate īrṣyā cittasyāśuddham eva ca || 7 ||
S08n2927:427: siddhir na syād bhavet śuddhyā punarjanmabhavāntare || 8 ||
S08n2927:430: bhāvaḥ kīdṛśaṃ abhāvo bhāvo bhāvyaḥ kathaṃ bhavet || 9 ||
S08n2927:432: bhaginī kathaṃ rūpaṃ gaurī śyāmā kṛṣṇavarṇajām |
S08n2927:433: īdṛśaṃ rūpa saṃyuktaṃ śuddhacitto na drakṣyati || 10 ||
S08n2927:435: bhāginī kathaṃ śrūyate śabdaḥ dhvanis trividham eva ca |
S08n2927:438: ghrāṇaṃ trividhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kā yā sā jananī suguhyakā |
S08n2927:441: svajihvena bhuñjate dravyaṃ ṣaḍrasaṃ svāda yādṛśī |
S08n2927:442: svādena bhuñjate yuktaṃ svādaṃ rūpasya kīdṛśī || 13 ||
S08n2927:448: bhāve na abhāvo asti abhāvam eva ca |
S08n2927:453: dṛṣṭiyuktaṃ bhavet karuṇā maitrī āliṅganasya ca ||
S08n2927:455: ubhayamelāpakaṃ tat kṣaraṇam upekṣā rasā smṛtā mayā || 17 ||
S08n2927:458: (27) darśanāj jāyate duḥkham āliṅganāt kiṃcit tatphalam |
S08n2927:461: evaṃ traidhātuka utpannaṃ harṣaviṣāda etat phalam |
S08n2927:464: yat kiṃcit khāna pānaṃ ca sukhāvahabhojanaṃ tathā |
S08n2927:465: tat sarvaṃ viṇmūtrādi prakalpayet yogavit sadā || 20 ||
S08n2927:468: malanaḥ mardanaś caiva mahāmudrā sa kathyate |
S08n2927:472: tāṃ pūjayed yogī kāmate na ca lipyate || 22 ||
S08n2927:474: lepa īrṣyādisaṃyuktaṃ tasya doṣair na bādhyate |
S08n2927:475: sa yogī paramaṃ tattvam bhavadoṣair na lipyate || 23 ||
S08n2927:477: yāvan na viṣaya unmuli-ai tāma budhataṇu kema |
S08n2927:480: (28) iti buddhakapālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare cit- taviśuddhipaṭalaḥ trayodaśamaḥ || ||
S08n2927:485: tathā- atha vajrapāṇiprabhṛtayo bodhisattvāḥ sumeruparamāṇura- jasamā yoginyaḥ,
S08n2927:489: sarvabuddhānāṃ tu jananī lakṣmī ghorā mahāyaśā |
S08n2927:495: buddhakāpāle mahātantre buddhair yeṣāṃ na prakāśitā |
S08n2927:497: tāṃ bhāṣitā devī eka rutena prakaṭīkṛtāḥ || 5 ||
S08n2927:507: tathāgatāś ca sarvabuddhāḥ śṛṇvantu nāgāś ca sadevamānuṣāḥ || 7 ||
S08n2927:509: ayaṃ tantrarājasya pāṭhamātreṇa yat puṇyaṃ tat sarvapuṇyam anumodayantu pariṇāmayantu mahāmudrārthe niryātayantu buddhaguṇākarān || 8 ||
S08n2927:517: yad icchet siddhiṃ varāṃ divyāṃ japed buddhakāpālayogataḥ || 10 ||
S08n2927:519: oṃ hrīṃ buddha hūṃ kāpālinī āḥ ||
S08n2927:529: evaṃjāpaṃ mānayuktaṃ siddhir bhavati na saṃśayaḥ || 12 ||
S08n2927:531: hṛdayamantraḥ- oṃ buddhakāpālinī āḥ hīḥ haiḥ hūṃ phaṭ || 13 ||
S08n2927:533: upahṛdayamantraḥ- oṃ buddhakāpālavajriṇi hau durjaya durlakṣe hūṃ phaṭ || 14 ||
S08n2927:544: harṣitā devī dṛṣṭvā idam vacanam abravīt |
S08n2927:551: paścāt ātmānaṃ niryātayet prājña dṛḍhabhaktena cetasā || 20 ||
S08n2927:557: tatraiva tiṣṭhanti sarvaḍākinyaḥ anye ye ca kṛpākulāḥ || 22 ||
S08n2927:559: indī yattha vilayagau naṭṭa vi appasahāva |
S08n2927:560: so hale paramāṇandagai phuḍa pucchaha gurupā-a || 23 ||
S08n2927:562: tasmai namo yadudayena samānakālam astaṅgatāni viṣayaiḥ samam indriyāṇi |
S08n2927:566: iti buddhakāpālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare jāpamudrādhyeṣaṇāsarvatantranidānapaṭalaś caturdaśaḥ || ||
S08n2927:568: idam avocat citrasenāyoginīprabhṛtayaḥ sarvayoginyaḥ vajraprāṇiprabhṛtibodhisattvā sarve mahābodhisattva svakas- vake sthāne viharan |
